actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 746) to amend the Administrative Procedure Act to make regulations more cost-effective, to ensure periodic review of old rules, to improve regulatory planning and management, to eliminate needless formality and delay, to enhance public participation in the regulatory process, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 746 (Administrative procedure).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 746) to amend the Administrative Procedure Act to make regulations more cost-effective, to ensure periodic review of old rules, to improve regulatory planning and management, to eliminate needless formality and delay, to enhance public participation in the regulatory process, and for other purposes.
